name: PlusValue
goal:
PlusValue is a social business that dynamically combines research, experimentation, consultancy and policy activities to create societal value in public goods. Our main activities are:
1) Knowledge: Initiate independent research and experiment with new solutions; Harness stakeholders and evidence combining different expertise and techniques; Move beyond state-of-the-art and explore original paths leading to new markets.
2) Consultancy: Conduct syndicated research focusing on impact measurement and strategy; Bespoke advice on integrated and sustainable social impact investment strategy for public, private, and non-profit sectors; Advise on European strategy and internationalisation (EU funding, policy and partnerships); Support in fundraising (public/private donor/investors) as part of strategy consulting service.
3) Policy: Evidence-based policy; Policy change in the social impact agenda; Change terms of public debate on public value creation; Creation of new narratives; Capitalise on new tech to harness public engagement; Targeting EU, national and local governments.
interests: Communication, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth

- EU Social Investment Package for growth and social cohesion (SIP) and modernisation of social protection systems towards a social investment approach.
